Project Summary¶

PySimiam Introduction¶

This program is a python port and modification of Jean-Pierre de la Croix’s Sim.I.Am robotics simulator.

The coding scheme is designed to be robust and extendable for using other robots through abstracting the base methods.

Please enjoy.

Release Changelog¶

1.0 First release
